patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -4,5 +4,7 @@
 
 # Uncomment the following line to enable the Corne OLED Display
 # CONFIG_ZMK_DISPLAY=y
 
-# Set deep sleep 
+# Set deep sleep to 30 minutes
+CONFIG_ZMK_DEEP_SLEEP=y
+CONFIG_ZMK_DEEP_SLEEP_TIMEOUT=1800

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -5,6 +5,6 @@
 # Uncomment the following line to enable the Corne OLED Display
 # CONFIG_ZMK_DISPLAY=y
 
 # Set deep sleep to 30 minutes
-CONFIG_ZMK_DEEP_SLEEP=y
-CONFIG_ZMK_DEEP_SLEEP_TIMEOUT=1800
+CONFIG_ZMKSLEEP=y
+CONFIG_ZMK_DEEP_SLEEP_TIMEOUT=

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -5,6 +5,8 @@
 # Uncomment the following line to enable the Corne OLED Display
 # CONFIG_ZMK_DISPLAY=y
 
 # Set deep sleep to 30 minutes
-CONFIG_ZMKSLEEP=y
-CONFIG_ZMK_DEEP_SLEEP_TIMEOUT=
+CONFIG_ZMK_SLEEP=y
+CONFIG_ZMK_IDLE_SLEEP_TIMEOUT=3600000
+
+# Change

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -8,5 +8,6 @@
 # Set deep sleep to 30 minutes
 CONFIG_ZMK_SLEEP=y
 CONFIG_ZMK_IDLE_SLEEP_TIMEOUT=3600000
 
-# Change 
+# Change board name
+

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# Uncomment the following lines to enable the Corne RGB Underglow
# CONFIG_ZMK_RGB_UNDERGLOW=y
# CONFIG_WS2812_STRIP=y

# Uncomment the following line to enable the Corne OLED Display
# CONFIG_ZMK_DISPLAY=y

# Set deep sleep
